title: 崩溃啊！
txt_content:
Minecraft崩溃报告


可能是Mod或其他问题。
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:114)
Caused by: cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLSecurityManager$ExitTrappedException
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLSecurityManager.checkPermission(FMLSecurityManager.java:25)
        at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkExit(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Runtime.exit(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.System.exit(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:138)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)
        ... 5 more

*** Game Exited ***
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 5
    at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLSecurityManager.checkPermission(FMLSecurityManager.java:21)
    at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkExit(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Runtime.exit(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.System.exit(Unknown Source)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:131)

replies.author: 冰冻の小溢
replies.txt_content: 这个万一是服务器的问题的话在后台输入/fml confirm
本问题已解决 楼主使用了启动器下载
暂无最佳答案。。但是问一个问题 启动器下载的forge在哪里 整合包为什么没有 别人拿到以后还要重新下forge 以及一系列中文补丁等
